announcementDescription: Because somebody forgot to write these.
announcementText:
First update ever!

Includes very important things, like the cool main menu
you are currently looking at, the loading screen you just
saw, and the hotbar you get when you select a profile.
There's also an error screen that will show up if anything
breaks, but hopefully you will never see it!

Also added the 2 items you currently see on screen,
those being the Basic Furnace and Basic Iron Dropper.

You can view info about them at the bottom of this
announcement, and you can view their stats in the
minenonomicon by pressing middle mouse button on
the item.
That sounded cooler in my head, too late!

announcementDescription: Lovely, even more GUIs to break!
announcementText:
Yet another update.

This one adds menus for you to poke around in!
Those include the inventory, shop, gamepass shop and settings.

changed: Opened Currencies In Hotbar Should Now Properly Save State
